Key Match Events: Luis Chávez scored a goal in the 43rd minute
Edson Álvarez scored a goal in the 101st minute
Post-Match Reflections: Mexico secured a place in the 2024 Copa America
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held in Mexico City's Estadio Azteca
The match went to a penalty shootout with Mexico winning 4-2
Others: Mexico will play a friendly against Colombia on Dec. 16, 2023
Honduras will participate in a do-or-die play-in match for Copa America qualification in March 2024
